name: 3 AM Simulator: Hide and Seek
description:
You play as two teenage girls who love to explore the paranormal together.  Then, one night, they find out about the One Man Hide and Seek game and decide to try it for themselves.  Will they survive the wrath of the possessed teddy bear, or will they succumb to the demon attached to it?

Credit for all scripts, songs, and tilesets go to their respective creator.

T for Teen because of the horror aspect of it.
